name: remotegamepad
description: Mobile HTML5 web gamepad for the smartphone directly mapping to the native gamepad API communicating through WebRTC.

scripts.build:docs: copyfiles -u 1 src/assets/* docs & parcel build src/*.html -d docs --public-url ./
scripts.build: npm run build:client & npm run build:server & npm run build:server:lib
scripts.build:client: rimraf client/index.* && parcel build src/client.ts -d client/ && tsc --project tsconfig-client-declaration.json && renamer --find client. --replace index. "client/*"
scripts.build:server: rimraf server/index.* && parcel build src/server.ts -d server/ && tsc --project tsconfig-server-declaration.json && renamer --find server. --replace "index." "server/*"
scripts.build:server:lib: parcel build src/serverlib.ts -d server/ && tsc --project tsconfig-serverlib-declaration.json

author: Marco Klein
